H0.text: Who in the Bible, became the first drunken man after planting a vineyard. Adam

H1.text: Who in the Bible, became the first drunken man after planting a vineyard. Cain

H2.text: Who in the Bible, became the first drunken man after planting a vineyard. Abraham

H3.text: Who in the Bible, became the first drunken man after planting a vineyard. NOAH

A4.text: After the flood, the Bible says that Noah became a farmer and he planted a vineyard. He drank wine made from this vineyard, and got drunk

A5.text: Noah is also portrayed as a 'tiller of the soil' who is the first to cultivate the vine
